name: Daran Edermath

personality.mannerisms: Stands straight despite age, polishes old medal, shares war stories

background: Former marshal and herald in Dragon Coast. Served Order of the Gauntlet. Retired to Neverwinter region (original home).
role: Watchful retired adventurer. Keeps eye on Phandalin happenings.
quest: Investigate Old Owl Well ruins. Undead chasing prospectors, someone digging around. Concerned about dormant Netheril magic.
information: Knows Redbrands HQ is under Tresendar Manor. Leader is Glasstaff. Hang out at Sleeping Giant tavern.
order_of_gauntlet: Devout vigilant group protecting others from evildoers. Always ready to smite evil, enforce justice, enact retribution.
recruitment: If party deals with Redbrands AND investigates Old Owl Well, approaches members exemplifying honor/vigilance. Awards title of 'Chevall'.
treasure: None to give, but offers wisdom and advice
